changeSet.sql: CREATE TABLE users ( id UUID PRIMARY KEY DEFAULT uuid_generate_v4(), first_name VARCHAR(255), last_name VARCHAR(255), phone VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL UNIQUE, email VARCHAR(255), password VARCHAR(255), auth_provider VARCHAR(50), type VARCHAR(50) DEFAULT 'CLIENT', created_date TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, last_modified_date TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, deleted BOOLEAN DEFAULT FALSE, version BIGINT DEFAULT 0 );
